content: indianer head band designed by lisa gentry materials tlc® cotton plus™ art e516 3 oz/85g 155 yd/140m 1 skein 3324 thistle crochet hook 5 mm us h-8 yarn needle gauge in pattern 11 sts = 2 4 row = appr 2 25 measurements 2 wide appr 18-20 around optional instructions chain 11 row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook *1 chain skip 1 st double_crochet in next st* repeat from *to* 2 more times double_crochet in last stitch turn 11 sts row 2 3 chain double_crochet in next double_crochet *1 chain skip 1 st double_crochet in next double_crochet* repeat from *to* 2 more times double_crochet in last double_crochet turn 11 sts repeat row 2 until piece meas appr 18-20 from beginning finishing crochet or sew ends together fasten_off fringes using 2 strands of yarn with left side facing join yarn with slip_stitch in any edge double_crochet and work chain appr 6 to 8 long fasten_off weave the fringe on right side through other edge see picture then work 3 more fringes beside last worked fringe copyright 2007 ©lisa gentry hook & needle designs llc 212 spruce drive chatham la 71226 www hookandneedledesigns com
